channel.title: Making virtual machine go trough VPN connection
channel.description:
While I was doing some things on my virtual machine, *Malwarebytes* blocked some proxy connections on my host machine (PC) because of malware. Because I didn't want to get infected in any way, I though to make all network on that machine go trough VPN on my host machine.
I have NordVPN and when I connected to it without changing any network settings on virtual machine, programs just couldn't work (proxy tools). So I though that I need to specify in virtual machine that it should go trough VPN connection.
I tried to set it to *Bridged adapter* - *VPN Tap adapter*, but still programs don't work.
Does anyone have idea how to propertly set it up so software that uses network actually works? Also, why software doesn't work when I just connect to VPN on my host machine?
